NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Oeno, I hope this scroll reaches you on the quantum shard: I request urgent assistance in locating a native lifeform that has escaped the <color=orange>Sanctuary!!</color>
2
1
CYCAD: I disengaged my voyager stone by accident earlier, causing the quantum shard to slip from my sight.. along with one of the native species that was resting on it!
3 2
OENO: When I reconnected to my voyager, the lifeform was gone! We must find it before the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> begins; the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> is their only protection if the project fails!
4
3
OENO: I have located and delivered the escaped lifeform back into the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> Cycad! Please watch over them with great care.
5
3
OENO: But Cycad, you should be able to easily travel using the quantum shard as a voyager! If any more escapes occur, I implore you to give chase.
6
5
CYCAD: But the surface of the planet is never completely dark enough to allow a conscious being to travel to it using the quantum shard. I do not see how...
7
6
CYCAD: Oh! The voyager lacks the ability to observe its surroundings on its own.. Does that mean...
8
7
CYCAD: How fascinating! When the quantum shard next visits inside the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> I shall try out this hypothesis at once.
SY EX1 3
SY EX3 7
